column5: I'm a bit out of commission right now Guy's,and cant sit at this 'Puter too long. So, I just want to wish everyone A MERRY CHRISTMAS< and A HAPPY NEW YEAR !!   The Title should read  'all and sundry' LOL
Hope everything is alright Nanook.  Merry Christmas to you also.  Joey  p.s.  You can edit your Title too f.y.i.
I wish you and Jackie a VERY Merry Christmas and health  for the coming new year.
Hope it's nothing too serious Jack and what Roy said  Maureen
Wishing you and yours a very Merry Christmas Jack!!!
A very Merry Christmas To you and your's too Nanook...  All the best for the New Year....
Likewise Jack, Hope everything is OK? All the best to you and Jackie over the holidays and health and happiness in "08"!  Sincerely, Jim and Leah
Have a Great Christmas Jack !! Hope Santa brings you a few new sharp tools !
